title: Chat ban
body:
uhmm ok hi guys, ive never made a post like this before and ive seen other people make these types of posts but theyre always in the wrong. but id like to share these chat logs with you guys and pls just let me know what you think. I personally can care less about the chat ban but im really upset about losing my honor like thats so messed up.  it sucks cuz yall cant see what they were saying to me, it prob looks like im a maniac lmao. i was really trying to hold my composure.
Game 1
Pre-Game
